mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM cart WHERE prdNo=#{prdNo} AND memId=#{memId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart(memId, prdNo, cartQty) VALUES (#{memId}, #{prdNo}, #{cartQty})
mapper.update: UPDATE cart SET cartQty = cartQty + #{cartQty} WHERE memId=#{memId} AND prdNo=#{prdNo}
mapper.select: SELECT c.cartNo, p.prdNo, p.prdImg, p.prdName, p.prdPrice, c.cartQty, c.memId FROM product p, cart c WHERE p.prdNo = c.prdNo AND c.memId=#{memId} ORDER BY c.cartNo
